ichor.hpc.log package

Subpackages

  • ichor.hpc.log.concurrent_log_handler package
  • ichor.hpc.log.portalocker package

Module contents

Implements logging functionalities for ICHOR to time how long jobs took, as well as to log important information a user should know (e.g. integration errors for points).

setup_logger(name, log_file, level=10, formatter=<logging.Formatter object>)
